text: Loka ho! Allahane tumhala matipasuna nirmana kele, maga viryapasuna, maga tumhala jodi (jodape nara-nari) banavile. Striyance garbha dharana karane ani balace janma ghene, ya sarvance tyala jnana ahe, ani konatahi ayusyamana dirghayusya prapta karita nahi ani na konace ayusya ghadate, parantu he sarva eka granthata astitvata ahe. Allakarita hi gosta phara sopi ahe
